title: Bobby’s Mailbag: Breaking Up With Boyfriend Who Is Afraid of Spiders + Listener Gets Tattoo Of Bobby’s Handwriting + Kenny Chesney On What He’s Watching on Netflix
itunes:title: Bobby’s Mailbag: Breaking Up With Boyfriend Who Is Afraid of Spiders + Listener Gets Tattoo Of Bobby’s Handwriting + Kenny Chesney On What He’s Watching on Netflix
description:
Bobby opens up an email about a listener who needs advice on her boyfriend who is afraid of spiders and mice. A listener called in to talk about how she got his handwriting tattooed on her wrist. Plus, we talk to Kenny Chesney about his new tour, what he’s watching on Netflix and his new tour name.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
